name: Mango and Beet Halwa bites with Candied Beet Coconut Rice thins. vegan glutenfree option
description: Halwa balls are a traditional Indian dessert that are vegan and gluten free. Time to treat yourself to these delicious bites!
recipeIngredient: 2 Tablespoons candied beet and some beet syrup
1/4 cup rice cereal - ground coarsely with a pulse in the blender
1/4 cup semolina (to make glutenfree, substitute with cream of rice or make pink Beet coconut balls with added rice cereal)
2 -3 Tablespoons raw sugar (more if the mango is not ripe enough)
Add 2 Tablespoons Candied beet and 1 teaspoon beet syrup

itemListElement.text: In a pan, add the chopped beet, ginger, water and sugar. Mix well and cook on low-medium heat until the syrup thickens to like maple syrup consistency. 35+ minutes. I had a little more than a Tablespoon syrup reserve.
itemListElement.name: In a pan, add the chopped beet, ginger, water and sugar. Mix well and cook on low-medium heat until the syrup thickens to like maple syrup consistency. 35+ minutes. I had a little more than a Tablespoon syrup reserve.

itemListElement.text: In a bowl, add flaxmeal, raw sugar and warm water and mix well.
itemListElement.name: In a bowl, add flaxmeal, raw sugar and warm water and mix well.

itemListElement.text: Add coconut flakes to a blender and Blend a bit till some of it become buttery.
itemListElement.name: Add coconut flakes to a blender and Blend a bit till some of it become buttery.

itemListElement.text: Add the Rice cereal and baking powder to the same blender, and pulse it once or twice to make a coarse flour.
itemListElement.name: Add the Rice cereal and baking powder to the same blender, and pulse it once or twice to make a coarse flour.

itemListElement.text: Add to flaxmeal mixture and combine.
itemListElement.name: Add to flaxmeal mixture and combine.

itemListElement.text: Add 2-3 Tablespoons candied beet cubes, a teaspoon of beet syrup, mix and form 4-5 medium size thin cookies.
itemListElement.name: Add 2-3 Tablespoons candied beet cubes, a teaspoon of beet syrup, mix and form 4-5 medium size thin cookies.

itemListElement.text: Bake at pre-heated 350 degrees F for 15-17 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Bake at pre-heated 350 degrees F for 15-17 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Serve warm, layered with warm halwa, topped with candied beet and coconut flakes.(and/or beet syrup)
itemListElement.name: Serve warm, layered with warm halwa, topped with candied beet and coconut flakes.(and/or beet syrup)

itemListElement.text: Blend the chopped mango, sugar and water and keep ready.
itemListElement.name: Blend the chopped mango, sugar and water and keep ready.

itemListElement.text: In a deep pan, add the semolina and roast on medium heat for 2-3 minutes until the color starts to change.
itemListElement.name: In a deep pan, add the semolina and roast on medium heat for 2-3 minutes until the color starts to change.

itemListElement.text: Add the coconut flakes and coarsely ground rice cereal and roast or another minute or 2 until the coconut smells toasty and leaves a little oil.
itemListElement.name: Add the coconut flakes and coarsely ground rice cereal and roast or another minute or 2 until the coconut smells toasty and leaves a little oil.

itemListElement.text: Add the blended mango mixture and cook on low heat until the dry ingredients absorb the puree and make a thick halwa consistency.(3-4 minutes, stir every few seconds)
itemListElement.name: Add the blended mango mixture and cook on low heat until the dry ingredients absorb the puree and make a thick halwa consistency.(3-4 minutes, stir every few seconds)

itemListElement.text: Remove half of the mixture and keep aside to cool a bit.
itemListElement.name: Remove half of the mixture and keep aside to cool a bit.

itemListElement.text: To the other half, add a Tablespoon of candied beet cubes and a teaspoon of beet syrup(if you have some left), mix for a few seconds.
itemListElement.name: To the other half, add a Tablespoon of candied beet cubes and a teaspoon of beet syrup(if you have some left), mix for a few seconds.

itemListElement.text: Take off heat and keep aside to cool.
itemListElement.name: Take off heat and keep aside to cool.

itemListElement.text: Make balls or other shapes with the halwa mixture and place on coconut rice candied beet thins. Top with candied beet cubes(how pretty are those), coconut shreds (and beet syrup-optional). Serve warm.
